projects.title: USA Natural Disaster Predictor
projects.blurb: This project is a web application that predicts the likelihood of natural disasters occurring in the USA based on historical FEMA data. It provides visualizations of predicted disasters on a map, in a bar chart, and in a table format.

projects.title: Vagabond Connect
projects.blurb: Full Stack Social Media Web app with CRUD functionality created with MERN (React, TypeScript, NodeJS, Express, and MongoDB). Uses Socket.io for live messanging and notificatons update.

projects.title: Admin Metrics Dashboard
projects.blurb: Admin dashboard for managers and team leads to visualize employee performance with interactive charts and graphs created with D3.js. Reads data from a database with live updates on employee metrics.

projects.title: Suay Resort
projects.blurb: Hotel Booking website with a database for bookings created using the MERN stack. Users can manage bookings and are alerted if a room is full or available at a specified date.

projects.title: Bicycle eCommerce Shop
projects.blurb: Biycle eCommerce wesbite with user authentication created with the MERN stack. Has a persistant shopping cart that is stored in the client's browser.

work.title: frontend developer
duties: Work alongside other software engineers to contribute HTML, CSS, and JS code to an existing codebase by creating and maintaining web applications.
Use SQL to make sensitive updates to code and files stored in an AWS bucket.
Work off a Jira Kanban board in an agile work methodology through sprint cycles.
Use the data visualization library D3JS to showcase beautiful and informative visuals to clients.
Communicate with the designers who specialize in designing dynamic web content to help them better understand the dynamic data we handle and how to best represent them.

Create internal tools for the Creative team such as a metrics dashboard to help the team leaders better see the metrics for designers using data from Google Sheets and using Google Apps Script to host the application.
Contribute to new products such as Websites by helping designers better understand the fundamentals of CSS class names and HTML structuring.

work.title: Learing Web Development
duties: Learned the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Expanded my knowledge by learning about frontend frameworks and backend web technologies such as Node.js
Built projects that tested my abilities as a developer.
Technically still ongoing as being a developer means always learning new techniques and technologies.

education.title: B.S. - Computer Science
duties: Learned the fundamentals of programming including OOP, Data Structures, and Software Engineering.
Advance knowledge of Java and Java frameworks such as Spring.
Created REST web servers with the use of Java Spring Boot.
Demonstrated strong application development through capstone project.

about.title: Frontend Expert
